plot: The last train allowed to pass the newly formed DMZ allowing those that wanted to return to their homes to do so, but wouldn't let those wanting to return north to ever return. The Last Train is a saga about people touched by civil war.
title: The Last Train: Kyong-wei Son
plot_es: The last train allowed to pass the newly formed DMZ allowing those that wanted to return to their homes to do so, but wouldn't let those wanting to return north to ever return. The Last Train is a saga about people touched by civil war.
plot_en: The last train allowed to pass the newly formed DMZ allowing those that wanted to return to their homes to do so, but wouldn't let those wanting to return north to ever return. The Last Train is a saga about people touched by civil war.
